p:
Five groups of mice (6 mice/group) were induced with solid tumours by subcutaneous injection of DLA cells (1 X 10 6 cells/animal) into the right hind limb to determine the effect of LEAM on solid tumour growth. Drug administration was initiated 24Â h after tumour cell inoculation orally and continued for 10 consecutive days. The treatment schedule for animal groups is as follows:
Group I: DLA-bearing mice (Negative control)
Group II: DLA-bearing mice with a dose of 3.5 mg/kg b.wt. Cisplatin
Group III: DLA-bearing mice + 100 mg/kg b.wt. LEAM
Group IV: DLA-bearing mice + 200 mg/kg b.wt. LEAM
Group V: DLA-bearing mice + 500 mg/kg b.wt. LEAM.
